title: Mind-Map Reading Strategies for Enhancing Visual Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Students acquire visual literacy skills by analyzing science-related mind maps. Learning occurs in non-real-time environments using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can understand the radial structure of mind maps and apply systematic navigation strategies.
Learners can infer relationships between information by analyzing the placement of visual elements (images, connectors).
Learners can improve information integration and memory efficiency by over 20% using a text-mind map integrated learning strategy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
